capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Snape's family history and it's really interesting. capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape, the way he's always been portrayed as this intimidating figure in the wizarding world is quite a misconception. I mean, have you seen his backstory? He was a victim of bullying and abuse himself, which makes him even more complex and relatable. But at the same time, his harsh demeanor can be off-putting, especially to those who don't know him well.

Snape, he's definitely a complex character in the Harry Potter series. I mean, on one hand, he can come across as really intimidating and strict, but at the same time, there's this hint of vulnerability and depth to him that makes you wonder what's really going on beneath the surface.
